price: 99.Waxaana u dayn qaarkood Maalintaa inay is buurtaan oo is dhex yaacaan (hirar oo kale) qaar kale, waxaana la afuufi Buunka, oo soo kulmin iyagoo dhan24.
arabic: ۞ وَتَرَكۡنَا بَعۡضَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَمُوجُ فِي بَعۡضٖۖ وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَجَمَعۡنَٰهُمۡ جَمۡعٗا
footnotes: 24. Maalinta dhismahaa weyn ee lagu xiray Ya’juuj iyo Ma’juuj la burburiyo.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā baʿḍahum yawma-idhin yamūju fī baʿḍin wanufikha fī al-ṣūri fajamaʿnāhum jamʿan
